findings.title: RRS - Redundant Require Statement
findings.description: Redundant `require` statement in the `add` function, which can lead to extra gas costs and increased complexity.

findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: Using SafeMath library, which is redundant in Solidity versions greater than or equal to 0.8.0.

findings.title: RSK - Redundant Storage Keyword
findings.description: Using `storage` keyword in a view function, which is redundant and can make the code less readable.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Not following Solidity naming conventions, which can make the code less readable and maintainable.

findings.title: L15 - Local Scope Variable Shadowing
findings.description: Local variable shadowing, which can lead to confusion and unintended consequences if not used correctly.

findings.title: L20 - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: Not checking if the result of the transfer methods is successful, which can lead to incorrect assumptions about the transfer.
